QuestData.Title: Dark Huntress
QuestData.Description: I have learned that a vicious beast, a Windward Huntress, terrorizes the wood on the northwest side of the island.$B$BShe has already slain several serpents, and injured more than one serpent rider sent to subdue her.$B$BShe must be removed before she can pose a danger to anyone else. Can you perform this task?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The huntress's den is in the northwestern part of Windward Isle.
